name: MineFaster 9000
description: The finest cryptocurrency mining software for your custom ASIC miner. It comes the latest and greatest hashing algorithm and will improve your mining efficiency by 500-3000%, making you the fastest miner in any mining pool that you decide to join.

name: Windows 9
description: Disatisfied with your current operating system? Feel like taking a gamble? Look no further, because our state of art Windows 9 is the software of your dreams. It will record everything you do on a Blockchain for maximum accountability. We will even be able to trace your wallet funds if you get hacked!
